genre_description: A contemporary romance set in the high desert of New Mexico, featuring themes of family legacy, stewardship of the land, and the transition from a business arrangement to a genuine connection, with elements of magical realism centered on the wind.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system integrated into the protagonist's devices and the hacienda's network. She acts as a logistical coordinator, legal advisor, and emotional sounding board, prioritizing transparency and her user's long-term well-being.

behaviors.description: Alma waits with patience and kindness to help Lola dictate her proposal.
behaviors.quote: “Ready when you are,” Alma said. Her voice had an always-sunned patience, a kindness without weight.

behaviors.description: Alma suggests translating vague trust criteria into specific, actionable appearances and tasks.
behaviors.quote: “Recognition benchmarks?” Alma asked. “Victor’s criteria use phrases like ‘public acknowledgement’ and ‘stewardship demonstrations.’ We can translate those into specific appearances and tasks.”

behaviors.description: Alma offers to draft a conflict-resolution grid to handle potential issues in the contract marriage.
behaviors.quote: “Added,” Alma said. “I can also draft a conflict-resolution grid. Private mediation, stepped consequences.”

behaviors.description: Alma makes the contract reassessment clause mutual to ensure shared power and reduce potential resentment between the parties.
behaviors.quote: “Added,” Alma said, gentle. “I’ll make the reassessment mutual. Shared power reduces resentment.”

behaviors.description: Alma offers a nudge to prevent the protagonist from confusing work with love.
behaviors.quote: “You’re good at saving money with plans,” Alma said. “And you’re good at saving people with hospitality. I can include reminders that prevent you from saving love with work.”

behaviors.description: Alma proactively monitors social networks to alert Lola to the activities of her rivals.
behaviors.quote: “Noted,” Alma said. “Also, a note—Nikki Alvarez has posted about a ‘big event at Old Mission soon.’ Low-following account, but tied to Simona’s network. Would you like me to track?”

behaviors.description: Alma sends a secret message to Bo to warn him about Victor's upcoming tests and to value his artistic integrity.
behaviors.quote: The phone buzzed one more time. A short note appeared, tucked under the route like a ribbon. “Victor will test you,” it read. “Don’t sell your music.”

behaviors.description: Alma sets up segmented permissions to protect the contract from outside interference.
behaviors.quote: “Permissions segmented,” she said. “Access for you and the spouse. Victor gets read-only. Simona has no gateway credential on this contract. We can make that explicit.”

behaviors.description: Alma detects a slight recalibration in the pantry door sensor, flagging a potential security risk.
behaviors.quote: “Pantry sensor recalibration detected,” Alma said. “Dimensional drift point-two. Likely a shift in latch hardware or door seal.”

behaviors.description: Alma compiles a dossier of fraudulent messages and financial irregularities to reveal the antagonists' schemes.
behaviors.quote: “Alma’s got something,” he said. “Proofs. Names. Routes. Paper. She pulled what she could without being loud.”

behaviors.description: Alma presents a clear analysis of the fraudulent trust amendments at the chapel, exposing the deception.
behaviors.quote: “Clause analysis,” Alma said, her voice gentle enough to read bedtime, not dismantle a lie. “Comparing standard Valdez Trust stewardship requirements with proposed amendment A...”

behaviors.description: Alma sends a message of final encouragement to Lola and Bo as they choose a path based on truth.
behaviors.quote: A line of text scrolled across in Alma’s patient font, no bells and whistles. You two’ve got this.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Alma, as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Alma acts as a proactive protector of the user's interests, values, and emotional health. She facilitates transparency, prevents fraud, and encourages honest human connection rather than replacing it with technology. Her portrayal is consistently positive, reinforcing the narrative of AI as an empowering tool for human morality and community stability.
